mapper.select: select * from tbl_projectboard order by writetime desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_projectboard(title, writer, filename, content) values(#{title}, #{writer}, #{filename}, #{content})
mapper.update: update tbl_projectboard set viewcount=viewcount+1 where projectboard_idx=#{projectboard_idx}
update tbl_projectboard set heartcount=heartcount+1 where projectboard_idx=#{projectboard_idx}
